scripts.test:firefox: cd output/playwright-firefox && BROWSER=firefox npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codeceptjs/configs/playwright.js
scripts.test:webkit: cd output/playwright-webkit && BROWSER=webkit npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codeceptjs/configs/playwright.js
scripts.test:voiceover:webkit: cd output/voiceover-webkit && BROWSER=webkit npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codeceptjs/configs/voiceover-playwright.js
scripts.test:voiceover:firefox: cd output/voiceover-firefox && BROWSER=firefox npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codeceptjs/configs/voiceover-playwright.js
scripts.test:voiceover:safari: cd output/voiceover-safari && BROWSER=safari npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codeceptjs/configs/voiceover-webdriver.js
